chainOfRules.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird. Then then press {key_act} for the next {n} {b} birds. Then press {key_act} when you see a {c} bird then the first {d} bird

once.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird once only

sequence of two.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird, followed immediately by a {b} bird

two identical.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see two {a} birds, one after another

negation.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see any bird that is not {a}

double negation.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see any bird that is not {a} and not {b}

total negation.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see any bird that is not {a}, {b} or {c}

simple sequence.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a sequence of three birds matching: {a}, {b}, {c}

branching.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} for every {a} bird until you see a {b} bird. Then press {key_act} every time you see a {b} bird

complex branching.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} for every {a} bird until you see a second {b} bird. Then press {key_act} every time you see a {c} bird

complexTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird followed by any other bird except {a} and then a {b} bird. Repeat this {n} times

orTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird or a {b} bird followed by any other bird except {a}. Repeat this {n} times

wildCardTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} bird or a {b} bird followed by any other bird, and then any bird except {a}. Repeat this {n} times

ordinals.humanReadableExplanation: Make note of the first two bird colours you see. Press {key_act} whenever you see the first colour followed immediately by the second

ordinal branching.humanReadableExplanation: If the second bird colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} bird. But if the second bird colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} bird
